source.description: Source of the data, eg self, nmea, ais, etc
Source of the data, eg self, nmea, ais, etc

vessels.title: vessels
vessels.name: vessels
vessels.description: The collection of all vessels known to the current server. This includes vessels from any source incl AIS, WIFI, mobile internet, etc.

vesselUid.title: vessels Uid
vesselUid.description: The globally unique identifier for the vessel. Ideally the MMSI number, but any unique name can be used.

communication.title: communication
communication.name: communication
communication.description: The communication methods supported by this vessel and relevant callsigns and addresses

emailHf.description: Email address to be used for HF email (Winmail, Airmail, Sailmail)

environmental.description: Holds all environmental data for the vessel. Environmental data is around the vessel rather than in it.

airPressureChangeRateAlarm.description: Change per hour which will cause an alarm in kPa

airTemp.description: Current air temperature in degrees Centigrade

currentDirection.description: Direction of water current in degrees true

currentSpeed.description: Speed of water current in m/s

tideHeightNow.description: The current tide height in meters

tideLowHeight.description: The next low tide height in meters

tideLowTime.description: Time of the next low tide in UTC

tideTimeHigh.description: Time of next high tide in UTC

transducerToKeel.description: Depth in meters between transducer and bottom of the keel.

waterLineToTransducer.description: Depth transducer is below the water in meters

waterTemp.description: Current water temperature in degrees Centigrade

windDirectionApparent.description: Apparent wind direction, -180 to +180 degrees from the bow. Negative numbers to port.

windDirectionChangeAlarm.description: The number of degrees the wind needs to shift to raise an alarm

windDirectionTrue.description: The wind direction relative to true north, in compass degrees, 0 = North

windSpeedAlarm.description: The speed in m/s above which a wind alarm will be raised

navigation.description: The current navigational data for this vessel

courseOverGroundMagnetic.description: Course Over Ground in degrees magnetic

courseOverGroundTrue.description: Course over ground in degrees true

currentRoute.description: The current route if one is active

bearingActual.description: The current bearing of the next waypoint in degrees true

bearingDirect.description: The bearing in degrees true from last waypoint to the next waypoint

courseRequired.description: The course required to make the next waypoint in degrees true

eta.description: The estimated time of arrival at the end of the current route

route.description: A pointer to the current route, found in the routes list

startTime.description: The time this route was activated in UTC

waypointLastTime.description: The time the last waypoint was reached in UTC

waypointLast.description: The last waypoint, a pointer to the list of waypoints

waypointNextEta.description: Estimated time of arrival at the next waypoint

waypointNext.description: A pointer to the next waypoint, found in the waypoints list

magneticVariation.description: The magnetic variation (declination) at the current position

destination.description: The intended destination of this trip

drift.description: The tidal drift at the current location in m/s

headingMagnetic.description: Current magnetic heading of the vessels in degrees

headingTrue.description: The current true heading of the vessel in degrees

position.description: The position of the vessel in 3 dimensions

altitude.description: Altitude of the GPS aerial in meters above mean sea level

pitch.description: Pitch in degrees, 0 is horizontal, +ve is bow up

rateOfTurn.description: Rate of turn in degrees per second

roll.description: Vessel roll in degrees looking to the bow, level = 0, clockwise is +ve

speedOverGround.description: Vessel speed over ground, in m/s

speedThroughWater.description: Vessel speed through the water in m/s

state.description: Current navigational state of the vessel

source.description: An object describing the source of this data on a vessel.

timezone.description: The timezone of the vessel, using ISO 8601
